name: Under and Over
text: You can slip under a foe trying to grab you, knocking him off balance.
prerequisites: Agile Maneuvers, Small size or smaller.
benefit: If an opponent larger than you attempts to grapple you and fails, you may make a trip attack as an immediate action against that opponent with a +2 bonus. This does not provoke an attack of opportunity.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend a number of stamina points up to your Dexterity bonus to increase the bonus on the trip attempt by 2 for each stamina point spent.
text_zh: 你可以从尝试抓你的敌人身旁滑过，让他摔个趔趄。
prerequisites_zh: 灵巧武艺，体型小型或更小。
benefit_zh: 如果一个比你大的敌人尝试擒抱你却失败了，你能以直觉动作对该名目标进行绊摔攻击，并且在这次攻击中获得+2加值。这不会引发借机攻击。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗点数至多为你的敏捷加值的耐力来在你的绊摔尝试上提供加值，每1点耐力提供2点加值。
